name: Burleigh Sheer and Mavro Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: Exclusive to DIYblinds, Burleigh and Mavro fabrics offer premium drape quality and smooth movement for double curtains. Ideal for sheer and blackout combinations, they provide excellent light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Fire-retardant and machine-washable, these fabrics suit pinch pleat and pencil pleat styles, ensuring perfect stacking and fullness.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Premium Burleigh and Mavro Fabrics Enhance Double Curtains with Light Control and Insulation
longDescription:
The Mavro Blackout Curtain and Burleigh Sheer Fabric combine to create an exceptional double curtain solution, offering unparalleled light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. The Mavro fabric, with its 280cm width and 100% polyester composition, features a 3-pass blackout coating and silicone finish, ensuring complete darkness and privacy, ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. Its fire retardant properties and sound dampening qualities make it suitable for both residential and commercial settings. Available in a modern palette, it supports various curtain styles, including double and triple pinch pleats, and pencil pleats, ensuring tailored folds and pleat definition.

Complementing this, the Burleigh Sheer Fabric, developed with James Dunlop Textiles, combines high linen content with polyester for a semi-translucent finish that softly diffuses natural light while maintaining privacy. Its resilience and ease of maintenance make it perfect for high-traffic or sun-exposed areas. Together, these fabrics offer a sophisticated and functional window treatment, enhancing any interior with their combined elegance and practicality.
careInstructions: Gently vacuum regularly with appropriate attachment. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. Use warm iron on reverse side using barrier cloth (max 110 degrees). Gentle dry cleaning possible. Caution: possible 3% shrinkage. Exercise caution when spot cleaning, test on hidden area of the curtain. Do not rub or wring. Professional cleaning recommended.

name: Aesop Sheer and Mavro Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Aesop and Mavro double curtains blend wide-width linen and fire-retardant polyester for a soft, structured drape. Ideal for Scandi interiors, they offer light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, suiting sheer and blackout combinations.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Aesop Mavro Curtains: Linen Blend Offers Light Control Privacy Thermal Insulation
longDescription:
The Mavro Blackout Curtain and Aesop Sheer Curtain together create a sophisticated double curtain solution, offering unparalleled functionality and style. The Mavro Blackout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 3 pass blackout coating, ensures complete light blockage and privacy, making it ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. Its fire retardant properties and sound dampening qualities enhance its suitability for both residential and commercial settings. Available in a modern palette, it supports various pleat styles, including double and triple pinch pleats, and is rolled full width to prevent creasing.

Complementing this, the Aesop Sheer Curtain, a blend of 50% linen and 50% polyester, adds elegance with its natural texture and refined style. Crafted in Italy, it offers a serene aesthetic in six nature-inspired neutrals. Its compatibility with multiple pleat styles and track or pole-mounted systems ensures versatility. Together, these curtains provide optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, enhancing any interior with their seamless integration and sophisticated design.

longDescription:

name: Audiance Sheer and Mavro Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Audience and Mavro double curtains offer a perfect blend of style and functionality. With a soft matte finish and tight weave, they ensure excellent drape quality and wave consistency. Made from durable, fire-retardant polyester, these curtains provide light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Ideal for track-mounted or ceiling-fixed styles, they complement pleated designs like pinch pleat or pencil pleat. The Swan colour adds a fresh touch, while the structured Mavro enhances fullness. Perfect for sheer and blackout combinations.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Style & Function: Double Curtains for Light Control, Privacy, & Insulation
longDescription: The Mavro Blackout Curtain and Audiance Sheer Curtain together create an exceptional double curtain solution, offering unparalleled light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. The Mavro Blackout Curtain, with its 280cm width and 100% polyester composition, features a 3 pass blackout coating and silicone finish, ensuring complete light blockage. Its fire retardant properties and sound dampening qualities make it ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. The Audiance Sheer Curtain, also crafted from 100% polyester, provides a delicate texture and tight weave, allowing soft light diffusion while maintaining privacy. Both fabrics are compatible with various curtain styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, offering tailored folds and pleat definition. Available in a modern neutral palette, these curtains enhance any decor, providing a sophisticated and functional window treatment for both residential and commercial settings.

name: Burano Sheer and Mavro Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: Burano's natural linen and Mavro's fire-retardant polyester combine in double curtains for optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Ideal for track-mounted styles, they suit coastal, rustic, or minimalist spaces with sheer and blackout options.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Layer Curtains: Linen & Fire-Retardant Polyester for Light, Privacy & Insulation
longDescription:
The Mavro Blackout Curtain and Burano Sheer Curtain together create an exceptional double curtain solution, offering a perfect blend of functionality and style. The Mavro Blackout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 3 pass blackout coating, ensures complete light blockage and privacy, making it ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. Together, these curtains offer superior light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, making them an ideal choice for those seeking both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

shortDescription: The Centennial Sheer Curtain and Mavro combine for perfect double curtains, offering light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Crafted from 100% polyester, they suit track-mounted or ceiling-fixed styles, enhancing wave, pinch, or pencil pleats.

longDescription:
The Mavro Blackout Curtain and Centennial Sheer Curtain combine to create an exceptional double curtain solution, offering unparalleled light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. The Mavro Blackout Curtain, with its 280cm width and 100% polyester composition, features a 3 pass blackout coating and silicone finish, ensuring complete darkness and privacy, ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. Its fire retardant properties and sound dampening qualities make it suitable for both residential and commercial settings. Available in versatile shades, it supports tailored folds and pleat definition, offering a minimalist aesthetic. Together, these curtains deliver a sophisticated and functional window treatment solution.

longDescription:
The Mavro Blackout and Mavi Sheer Curtains offer a sophisticated solution for those seeking both style and functionality in their window treatments. Crafted from 100% polyester, the Mavro Blackout Curtain features a 3 pass blackout coating and silicone finish, ensuring complete light blockage and privacy, ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. Its fire retardant properties and sound dampening qualities make it suitable for both residential and commercial use. Available in a modern palette, it supports various pleat styles, including double and triple pinch pleats, and is machine washable for easy care.

Complementing the blackout curtain, the Mavi Sheer Curtain provides a lightweight, semi-transparent design that gently diffuses light while maintaining privacy. Its weighted hem ensures a smooth drape, perfect for large windows or tall installations. Meeting fire safety standards, it is also machine washable and wrinkle-resistant. Together, these curtains offer optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, making them an ideal choice for any contemporary interior.
careInstructions: Gently vacuum regularly with appropriate attachment. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. Use warm iron on reverse side using barrier cloth (max 110 degrees). Gentle dry cleaning possible. Caution: possible 3% shrinkage. Exercise caution when spot cleaning, test on hidden area of the curtain. Do not rub or wring. Professional cleaning recommended.

name: Jilliby Sheer and Mavro Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Jilliby Sheer and Mavro double curtains offer excellent drape quality and smooth movement, perfect for wave and pleated styles. Combining sheer and blackout fabrics, they provide light control, privacy, and thermal insulation.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Layer Curtains: Sheer & Blackout for Light Control, Privacy, & Insulation
longDescription:
The Mavro Blackout Curtain and Jilliby Sheer Curtain together create an exceptional double curtain solution, offering unparalleled light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. The Mavro Blackout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 3 pass blackout coating, ensures complete darkness and privacy, making it ideal for bedrooms and media rooms. Its fire retardant properties and sound dampening qualities enhance its suitability for both residential and commercial settings. Available in a modern palette, it supports various curtain styles, including double and triple pinch pleats.

Complementing this, the Jilliby Sheer Curtain, made from high-quality textured sheer fabric, allows natural light to filter through while maintaining privacy. Its fire safety compliance makes it perfect for commercial spaces. Together, these curtains offer a sophisticated solution for any interior, combining the blackout's robust functionality with the sheer's elegant light diffusion.

Gentle dry cleaning possible. Caution: possible 3% shrinkage. Exercise caution when spot cleaning, test on hidden area of the curtain. Do not rub or wring. Professional cleaning recommended.

name: Burleigh Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: Burleigh sheer and Simplicity blockout curtains combine elegance and functionality. Perfect for double curtains, they offer light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Crafted for smooth movement and exceptional drape, they suit various pleated styles.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Elegant Dual Curtains: Light Control, Privacy & Insulation with Sheer & Blockout Combo
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout Curtain and Burleigh Sheer Fabric combine to create an exceptional double curtain solution, offering both functionality and aesthetic appeal. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a high colourfastness rating, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy.

Complementing this, the Burleigh Sheer Fabric, developed with James Dunlop Textiles, blends high linen content with polyester for a natural, textural finish. Its semi-translucent nature softly diffuses light, providing privacy and a warm ambience. Ideal for Australian climates, Burleigh is durable and easy to maintain. Together, these fabrics offer superior light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, suitable for various curtain styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, making them a practical and elegant choice for any interior.

longHeadline: Dual Function Drapes: Aesop Linen & Simplicity Blockout for Style, Privacy, Insulation
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout and Aesop Sheer Curtains offer a sophisticated solution for modern interiors, combining functionality with elegance. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments or as a standalone curtain. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a high colourfastness rating, ensuring durability.

The Aesop Sheer Curtain, made from a blend of linen and polyester, exudes sophistication with its natural texture and refined style. Available in six nature-inspired neutrals, it enhances any décor with its continuous fabric and elegant drape. Both curtains are compatible with various styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, offering tailored folds and pleat definition. Together, they provide optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, making them ideal for any interior setting.
careInstructions: Gently vacuum regularly with appropriate attachment. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. Use warm iron on reverse side using barrier cloth (max 110 degrees). Gentle dry cleaning possible. Caution: possible 3% shrinkage. Exercise caution when spot cleaning, test on hidden area of the curtain. Do not rub or wring. Professional cleaning recommended.

name: Alexandra Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Alexandra and Simplicity Blockout Curtains combine 100% polyester with a soft matte finish for excellent drape and wave consistency. Ideal for double curtains, they offer light control, privacy, and thermal insulation in sheer and blackout styles.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Function Curtains: Polyester Sheer & Blackout for Light, Privacy, Insulation
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout Curtain and Alexandra Sheer Curtain together create an ideal double curtain solution, combining functionality with modern elegance. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety in both residential and commercial settings. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it offers a colourfastness rating of 6, ensuring durability against fading.

Complementing this, the Alexandra Sheer Curtain, also made from 100% polyester, provides a fluid drape and minimalist aesthetic, perfect for urban interiors. Its lightweight yet durable construction supports various pleat styles, offering tailored folds and pleat definition. Together, these curtains offer optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, making them a sophisticated choice for any modern interior.

name: Allusion Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Allusion and Simplicity Blockout Curtains offer a perfect blend of natural linen look and superior drape quality. Ideal for double curtains, they provide light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Suitable for wave, ripple fold, pinch pleat, and pencil pleat styles.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Layer Curtains: Linen Look, Light Control & Insulation for All Styles
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout Curtain and Allusion Sheer Curtain Fabric together create an ideal double curtain solution, combining functionality with elegance for modern interiors. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design offers versatility for layered treatments or standalone use. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a colourfastness rating of 6, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy.

Complementing this, the Allusion Sheer Curtain Fabric, a sophisticated blend of linen, cotton, and polyester, offers a luxurious drape with an impressive width of 8000mm. Originating from India, it maintains vibrancy with a UV colour fastness rating of 5/8 and is certified fire retardant and environmentally friendly. Together, these fabrics provide optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, suitable for various curtain styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, ensuring tailored folds and pleat definition.

name: Centennial Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Centennial Sheer Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester, pairs perfectly with The Simplicity Blockout Curtain for double curtain systems. This combination offers light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, with smooth movement and optimal fullness for track-mounted or ceiling-fixed styles.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Functionality: Centennial Sheer & Simplicity Blockout for Light, Privacy, Insulation
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout and Centennial Sheer Curtains offer a sophisticated solution for modern interiors, combining functionality with elegance. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments or as a standalone curtain. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a high colourfastness rating, ensuring durability.

The Centennial Sheer Curtain, also made from 100% polyester, complements the blockout with its lightweight, durable fabric, providing soft movement and a minimalist aesthetic. Available in a versatile palette, it offers flexibility for neutral or tonal schemes. Both curtains are compatible with various styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, supporting tailored folds and pleat definition. Together, they offer optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, making them ideal for both residential and commercial settings.

name: Laconia Air Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: Laconia Air and The Simplicity Blockout Curtains combine pure linen and a 4-pass silicone coating for double curtains that offer light control, privacy, and thermal insulation. Ideal for wave, ripple fold, pinch pleat, and pencil pleat styles.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Layer Curtains: Linen & Silicone for Light Control, Privacy, Insulation
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout Curtain and Laconia Air Sheer Curtain together create an ideal double curtain solution, combining functionality with refined aesthetics. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets AS/NZS 1530.3 fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design offers versatility for layered treatments. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a colourfastness rating of 6, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy.

Complementing this, the Laconia Air Sheer Curtain, made from pure linen, provides a soft, flowing drape with a luxurious feel. Woven in Turkey, it integrates effortlessly into modern interiors, offering a classic charm. Certified under ISO 14001 and Oeko Tex 100, it meets high environmental standards. Together, these curtains offer optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, suitable for various curtain styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, on both track and pole-mounted systems.

name: Mavi Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: Mavi and Simplicity Blockout Curtains offer a perfect blend for double curtains, combining sheer elegance with blackout functionality. Crafted from lightweight polyester, they ensure excellent drape, privacy, and thermal insulation, enhancing any modern interior.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Layer Elegance: Mavi & Simplicity Curtains for Light, Privacy & Insulation
longDescription:
The Double Curtains collection combines the Simplicity Blockout Curtain and the Mavi Sheer Curtain, offering a perfect blend of functionality and style for modern interiors. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets AS/NZS 1530.3 fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a colourfastness rating of 6, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy.

The Mavi Sheer Curtain, also made from 100% polyester, provides gentle light diffusion and privacy without sacrificing natural daylight. Its lightweight, semi-transparent design includes a weighted hem for a smooth drape. Machine washable and wrinkle-resistant, it meets fire safety standards, making it suitable for various settings. Together, these curtains offer optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, adaptable to styles like double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, ensuring a tailored, professional aesthetic.

tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Dual Layer Elegance: Mavi & Simplicity Curtains for Light, Privacy & Insulation
longDescription:
The Double Curtains collection combines the Simplicity Blockout Curtain and the Mavi Sheer Curtain, offering a perfect blend of functionality and style for modern interiors. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets AS/NZS 1530.3 fire retardancy standards, enhancing safety. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments. Available in seven contemporary neutrals, it boasts a colourfastness rating of 6, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy.

The Mavi Sheer Curtain, also made from 100% polyester, provides gentle light diffusion and privacy without sacrificing natural daylight. Its lightweight, semi-transparent design includes a weighted hem for a smooth drape. Machine washable and wrinkle-resistant, it meets fire safety standards, making it suitable for various settings. Together, these curtains offer optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, adaptable to styles like double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, ensuring a tailored, professional aesthetic.
careInstructions: Gently vacuum regularly with appropriate attachment. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. Use warm iron on reverse side using barrier cloth (max 110 degrees). Gentle dry cleaning possible. Caution: possible 3% shrinkage. Exercise caution when spot cleaning, test on hidden area of the curtain. Do not rub or wring. Professional cleaning recommended.

name: Jilliby Sheer and Simplicity Blockout Double Curtain
shortDescription: The Jilliby Sheer Curtain and Simplicity Blockout Curtain combine elegance and functionality for double curtains. Enjoy light control, privacy, and thermal insulation with their superior drape quality. Ideal for ripple fold, pinch pleat, and pencil pleat styles.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 9 working days.
longHeadline: Elegant Dual Curtains: Light Control, Privacy & Insulation with Sheer & Blockout Combo
longDescription:
The Simplicity Blockout and Jilliby Sheer Curtains offer a sophisticated solution for modern interiors, combining functionality with aesthetic appeal. The Simplicity Blockout Curtain, crafted from 100% polyester with a 4 pass silicone coating, ensures complete light blockout and meets stringent fire retardancy standards, making it ideal for both residential and commercial settings. Its 320cm width allows for seamless coverage, while its plain design serves as a versatile base for layered treatments or as a standalone feature. Available in seven neutral shades, it boasts excellent colourfastness, ensuring long-lasting vibrancy.

Complementing this, the Jilliby Sheer Curtain is made from high-quality, textured sheer fabric, providing privacy while allowing natural light to filter through. Its neutral colourways blend effortlessly with contemporary palettes. Both curtains are compatible with various styles, including double pinch pleat, triple pinch pleat, and pencil pleat, offering tailored folds and pleat definition. Together, they provide optimal light control, privacy, and thermal insulation, making them a refined choice for any space.
careInstructions: Gently vacuum regularly with appropriate attachment. Do not bleach. Do not tumble dry. Use warm iron on reverse side using barrier cloth (max 110 degrees). Gentle dry cleaning possible. Caution: possible 3% shrinkage. Exercise caution when spot cleaning, test on hidden area of the curtain. Do not rub or wring. Professional cleaning recommended.
